Title: Relates to imposing a fee on landlords who have residential dwelling units which remain vacant for an extended period of time
Summary: Imposes a fee on landlords who have residential dwelling units which remain vacant for a period greater than three months and deposits such fee into a fund to provide housing vouchers for homeless individuals.
LawCode: Amd ยง14, Pub Hous L; add ยง99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to enacting the End Warehousing act of 2021; and to amend the public housing law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing a database of affordable vacant dwelling units and allocating such units
